verses.verse: In the twelfth<WH8147> year<WH8141> of Ahaz<WH271> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> Hoshea<WH1954> the son<WH1121> of Elah<WH425> began to reign<WH4427> in Samaria<WH8111> over Israel<WH3478> for nine<WH8672> years.<WH8141>
He did<WH6213> that which was evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of Yahweh,<WH3068> yet not as the kings<WH4428> of Israel<WH3478> who were before him.<WH6440>
Against him came up<WH5927> Shalmaneser<WH8022> king<WH4428> of Assyria;<WH804> and Hoshea<WH1954> became his servant,<WH5650> and brought<WH7725> him tribute.<WH4503>

The king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> found<WH4672> conspiracy<WH7195> in Hoshea;<WH1954> for he had sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> to So<WH5471> king<WH4428> of Egypt,<WH4714> and offered<WH5927> no tribute<WH4503> to the king<WH4428> of Assyria,<WH804> as he had done year<WH8141> by year:<WH8141> therefore the king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> shut him up,<WH6113> and bound<WH631> him in prison.<WH1004>
Then the king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> came up<WH5927> throughout all the land,<WH776> and went up<WH5927> to Samaria,<WH8111> and besieged<WH6696> it three<WH7969> years.<WH8141>

In the ninth<WH8671> year<WH8141> of Hoshea<WH1954> the king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> took<WH3920> Samaria,<WH8111> and carried<WH1540> Israel<WH3478> away<WH1540> to Assyria,<WH804> and placed<WH3427> them in Halah,<WH2477> and on the Habor,<WH2249> the river<WH5104> of Gozan,<WH1470> and in the cities<WH5892> of the Medes.<WH4074>

It was so,<WH1121> because the children of Israel<WH3478> had sinned<WH2398> against Yahweh<WH3068> their God,<WH430> who brought them up<WH5927> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> from under the hand<WH3027> of Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt,<WH4714> and had feared<WH3372> other<WH312> gods,<WH430>

and walked<WH3212> in the statutes<WH2708> of the nations,<WH1471> whom Yahweh<WH3068> cast out<WH3423> from before<WH6440> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and of the kings<WH4428> of Israel,<WH3478> which they made.<WH6213>

The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did secretly<WH2644> things<WH1697> that were not right against Yahweh<WH3068> their God:<WH430> and they built<WH1129> them high places<WH1116> in all their cities,<WH5892> from the tower<WH4026> of the watchmen<WH5341> to the fortified<WH4013> city;<WH5892>
and they set them up<WH5324> pillars<WH4676> and Asherim<WH842> on every high<WH1364> hill,<WH1389> and under every green<WH7488> tree;<WH6086>

and there they burnt incense<WH6999> in all the high places,<WH1116> as did the nations<WH1471> whom Yahweh<WH3068> carried away<WH1540> before<WH6440> them;<WH6213> and they worked wicked<WH7451> things<WH1697> to provoke Yahweh<WH3068> to anger;<WH3707>
and they served<WH5647> idols,<WH1544> of which Yahweh<WH3068> had said<WH559> to them,<WH6213> "You shall not do this thing.<WH1697>"

Yet Yahweh<WH3068> testified<WH5749> to Israel,<WH3478> and to Judah,<WH3063> by<WH3027> every prophet,<WH5030> and every seer,<WH2374> saying,<WH559> "Turn<WH7725> from your evil<WH7451> ways,<WH1870> and keep<WH8104> my commandments<WH4687> and my statutes,<WH2708> according to all the law<WH8451> which I commanded<WH6680> your fathers,<WH1> and which I sent<WH7971> to you by<WH3027> my servants<WH5650> the prophets.<WH5030>"
Notwithstanding,<WH8085> they would not listen, but hardened<WH7185> their neck,<WH6203> like the neck<WH6203> of their fathers,<WH1> who didn't<WH539> believe in Yahweh<WH3068> their God.<WH430>

They rejected<WH3988> his statutes,<WH2706> and his covenant<WH1285> that he made<WH3772> with their fathers,<WH1> and his testimonies<WH5715> which he testified<WH5749> to them;<WH3212> and they followed vanity,<WH1892> and became vain,<WH1891> and followed<WH310> the nations<WH1471> that were around<WH5439> them,<WH3068> concerning whom Yahweh had commanded<WH6680> them that they should not do like them.<WH6213>

They forsook<WH5800> all the commandments<WH4687> of Yahweh<WH3068> their God,<WH430> and made<WH6213> them molten images,<WH4541> even two<WH8147> calves,<WH5695> and made<WH6213> an Asherah,<WH842> and worshiped<WH7812> all the army<WH6635> of the sky,<WH8064> and served<WH5647> Baal.<WH1168>

They caused their sons<WH1121> and their daughters<WH1323> to pass<WH5674> through the fire,<WH784> and used<WH7080> divination<WH7081> and enchantments,<WH5172> and sold<WH4376> themselves to do<WH6213> that which was evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of Yahweh,<WH3068> to provoke him to anger.<WH3707>
Therefore Yahweh<WH3068> was very<WH3966> angry<WH599> with Israel,<WH3478> and removed<WH5493> them out of his sight:<WH6440> there was none left<WH7604> but the tribe<WH7626> of Judah only.<WH3063>
Also Judah<WH3063> didn't<WH8104> keep the commandments<WH4687> of Yahweh<WH3068> their God,<WH430> but walked<WH3212> in the statutes<WH2708> of Israel<WH3478> which they made.<WH6213>

Yahweh<WH3068> rejected<WH3988> all the seed<WH2233> of Israel,<WH3478> and afflicted<WH6031> them,<WH5414> and delivered them into the hand<WH3027> of spoilers,<WH8154> until he had cast<WH7993> them out of his sight.<WH6440>

For he tore<WH7167> Israel<WH3478> from the house<WH1004> of David;<WH1732> and they made Jeroboam<WH3379> the son<WH1121> of Nebat<WH5028> king:<WH4427> and Jeroboam<WH3379> drove<WH5080> Israel<WH3478> from following<WH310> Yahweh,<WH3068> and made them sin<WH2398> a great<WH1419> sin.<WH2401>
The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> walked<WH3212> in all the sins<WH2403> of Jeroboam<WH3379> which he did;<WH6213> they didn't<WH5493> depart from them;

until Yahweh<WH3068> removed<WH5493> Israel<WH3478> out of his sight,<WH6440> as he spoke<WH1696> by<WH3027> all his servants<WH5650> the prophets.<WH5030> So Israel<WH3478> was carried away<WH1540> out of their own land<WH127> to Assyria<WH804> to this day.<WH3117>

The king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> brought<WH935> men from Babylon,<WH894> and from Cuthah,<WH3575> and from Avva,<WH5755> and from Hamath<WH2574> and Sepharvaim,<WH5617> and placed<WH3427> them in the cities<WH5892> of Samaria<WH8111> instead of the children<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> and they possessed<WH3423> Samaria,<WH8111> and lived<WH3427> in the cities of it.<WH5892>

So it was,<WH8462> at the beginning of their dwelling<WH3427> there,<WH3372> that they didn't fear Yahweh:<WH3068> therefore Yahweh<WH3068> sent<WH7971> lions<WH738> among them,<WH2026> which killed some of them.

Therefore they spoke<WH559> to the king<WH4428> of Assyria,<WH804> saying,<WH559> "The nations<WH1471> which you have carried<WH1540> away,<WH3427> and placed in the cities<WH5892> of Samaria,<WH8111> don't<WH3045> know the law<WH4941> of the god<WH430> of the land.<WH776> Therefore he has sent<WH7971> lions<WH738> among them,<WH4191> and behold, they kill them,<WH3045> because they don't know the law<WH4941> of the god<WH430> of the land.<WH776>"

Then the king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> commanded,<WH6680> saying,<WH559> "Carry<WH3212> there one<WH259> of the priests<WH3548> whom you brought<WH1540> from there;<WH3212> and let them go and dwell<WH3427> there,<WH3384> and let him teach them the law<WH4941> of the god<WH430> of the land.<WH776>"

So one<WH259> of the priests<WH3548> whom they had carried away<WH1540> from Samaria<WH8111> came<WH935> and lived<WH3427> in Bethel,<WH1008> and taught<WH3384> them how they should fear<WH3372> Yahweh.<WH3068>

However every nation<WH1471> made<WH6213> gods<WH430> of their own,<WH3240> and put them in the houses<WH1004> of the high places<WH1116> which the Samaritans<WH8118> had made,<WH6213> every nation<WH1471> in their cities<WH5892> in which they lived.<WH3427>
The men<WH582> of Babylon<WH894> made<WH6213> Succoth Benoth,<WH5524> and the men<WH582> of Cuth<WH3575> made<WH6213> Nergal,<WH5370> and the men<WH582> of Hamath<WH2574> made<WH6213> Ashima,<WH807>

and the Avvites<WH5757> made<WH6213> Nibhaz<WH5026> and Tartak;<WH8662> and the Sepharvites<WH5616> burnt<WH8313> their children<WH1121> in the fire<WH784> to Adrammelech<WH152> and Anammelech,<WH6048> the gods<WH430> of Sepharvaim.<WH5617>

So they feared<WH3373> Yahweh,<WH3068> and made<WH6213> to them from among themselves<WH7098> priests<WH3548> of the high places,<WH1116> who sacrificed<WH6213> for them in the houses<WH1004> of the high places.<WH1116>
They feared<WH3373> Yahweh,<WH3068> and served<WH5647> their own gods,<WH430> after the ways<WH4941> of the nations<WH1471> from among whom they had been carried away.<WH1540>

To this day<WH3117> they do<WH6213> what they did<WH4941> before:<WH7223> they don't<WH3373> fear Yahweh,<WH3068> neither do<WH6213> they follow their statutes,<WH2708> or their ordinances,<WH4941> or the law<WH8451> or the commandment<WH4687> which Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> the children<WH1121> of Jacob,<WH3290> whom he named<WH7760> Israel;<WH3478>

with whom Yahweh<WH3068> had made<WH3772> a covenant,<WH1285> and commanded<WH6680> them,<WH559> saying, "You shall not fear<WH3372> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> nor bow<WH7812> yourselves to them,<WH5647> nor serve them,<WH2076> nor sacrifice to them;

but you shall fear<WH3372> Yahweh,<WH3068> who brought you up<WH5927> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> with great<WH1419> power<WH3581> and with an outstretched<WH5186> arm,<WH2220> and you shall bow<WH7812> yourselves to him,<WH2076> and you shall sacrifice to him.

The statutes<WH2706> and the ordinances,<WH4941> and the law<WH8451> and the commandment,<WH4687> which he wrote<WH3789> for you,<WH8104> you shall observe to do<WH6213> forevermore.<WH3117> You shall not fear<WH3372> other<WH312> gods.<WH430>
You shall not forget<WH7911> the covenant<WH1285> that I have made<WH3772> with you;<WH3372> neither shall you fear other<WH312> gods.<WH430>
But you shall fear<WH3372> Yahweh<WH3068> your God;<WH430> and he will deliver<WH5337> you out of the hand<WH3027> of all your enemies.<WH341>"
However they did not listen,<WH8085> but they did<WH6213> what they did<WH4941> before.<WH7223>

So these nations<WH1471> feared<WH3373> Yahweh,<WH3068> and served<WH5647> their engraved images.<WH6456> Their children<WH1121> likewise,<WH1121> and their children's children,<WH1121> as their fathers<WH1> did,<WH6213> so they do<WH6213> to this day.<WH3117>
